scripts.api-test-automation: newman run tests/DBAN-CH-PSD2-Group-API-integrate-SEPA-AND-SWIFT-payments.postman_collection.json -e env/MDB-R191-TEST.postman_environment.json -d data/MDB-R191-TEST.postman_data.json --reporters cli,junit,html,htmlextra --reporter-junit-export rpt.xml --reporter-html-export report/index.html --reporter-htmlextra-export report/rpt_ex.html
